about_the_game:
When the White Sun shines, the world around you turns clear, and dangerous monsters roam the streets. The one time you risk going outside during a white sun, you find a magic artefact that will bring you to a terrifying new world.

White Sun is a story-driven RPG with turn-based combat. Explore a dangerous world, defeat powerful monsters, and above all else find a safe place for you and your friends.

Features

  • A world of magic and monsters: Discover the secret of the mementos. And maybe learn something about yourself.
  • Strategic turn-based combat: Use every weapon, item and ability at your disposal to defeat powerful foes, and protect your allies.
  • Colourful personalities: Engage in banter with your friends. Take Bacon and Cheese pies from your neighbours.
